title: QuoteColo_Sean
author: QuoteColo_Sean
content: Hi y'all,I wanted to make a post looking for recommendations on companies that sell firmware for ASIC miners. I am looking for firmware for my S19 miners and wanted to see what everyone had to say when it came to where I should buy it from. Let me know!

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Why would you want to buy s19 firmware?The firmware for Antminer s19 is free it won't cost anything if you you download it directly on Bitmain. If you don't know where to download it then check this link https://shop.bitmain.com/support/downloador I think you are looking for firmware that can able to overclock? Only Braiins OS and ASIC.to that I know good firmware for s19.
